item.title: About Me
item.description: 2022-02-13 I am a curious programmer who loves to learn about something interesting. Professional Summary Accomplished Software Developer offering 11 years' experience in comprehensive design and development of infrastructure and architecture for software projects. Attentive collaborator and communicator from project conception to completion. Creative in devising solutions to improve business operations and meet clients' technical needs. Seasoned team leader possessing the technical and interpersonal skills to provide exceptional project deliverables.
